scripts.test: rm -rf reports && mkdir -p reports && cucumber-js tests/features/**/* --require cucumber.conf.js --require tests/stepDefinitions/login-steps.js --require tests/stepDefinitions/register-steps.js --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format json:./reports/cucumber-report.json --format html:./reports/cucumber-report.html --format html:./reports/cucumber-report.html --format json:./reports/cucumber-report.json --publish-quiet
